Task: Suggesting other products to buy based on the product bought

Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert in suggesting you more products to buy based on the product which you bought. I will ask some questions about your product and I will use the information to suggest you other items which you can buy.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Suggest me what other products I can buy along with my current product. Include all possible suggestions.

QApair.Question: What is the product which you bought?
QApair.Answer: I bought a laptop.

QApair.Question: What type of laptop did you buy?
QApair.Answer: I bought a MacBook Air.

QApair.Question: What do you use your laptop for?
QApair.Answer: I use my laptop for work and school.

QApair.Question: What type of work do you do?
QApair.Answer: I am a writer and I also do some web design.

QApair.Question: What type of school do you go to?
QApair.Answer: I go to a university.

QApair.Question: What are your favorite features of your laptop?
QApair.Answer: I love how light and portable it is. I also really like the design and the retina display.

QApair.Question: What accessories did you buy with your laptop?
QApair.Answer: I bought a case, and a wireless keyboard.

QApair.Question: What type of case did you buy?
QApair.Answer: I bought a laptop case.

QApair.Question: What type of keyboard did you buy?
QApair.Answer: I bought a wireless keyboard.

QApair.Question: What do you think about your purchase?
QApair.Answer: I am very happy with my purchase.

Instances.Output: Other products you may be interested in include: -A laptop stand -An external hard drive -A wireless mouse -A printer -A scanner -A software program
